dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McGarvey (for himself and Mr. Bilirakis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to reform and enhance the pay of Board of Veterans’ Appeals attorneys for recruitment and retention and to increase the decision quality and claims processing speed of the Board, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Board of Veterans’ Appeals Attorney Retention and Backlog Reduction Act.

section.header: Board of veterans’ appeals attorney career enhancement
section.text: Section 7101A(b) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting at the end the following new paragraph:
An individual employed by the Board as a non-supervisory attorney may be promoted to grade GS–15 of the General Schedule.
